attributes.action: Increase the amount of Helicopter Support, in both Attack and Logistics roles; to British Troops in Afghanistan
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To increase the availability to Commanders of both Attack (i.e Apache)and Support (Chinook etc)Helicopers to reduce the need to move Troops by vehicles which are susceptible to IED's and Land Mines.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
